info.name: Gmail 2018 Tweaks
info.description:
1. hides google hangouts when in collapsed sidebar mode
2. Adds additional spacing to reduce information density for easier readability
3. Softens up email and sidebar hover shadows
4. Stronger email titles
5. Hidden the awfull looking border around the gsuite button
info.additionalInfo: I will continue to tweak this style as I use gmail
